mapper.select: SELECT ticket_puchase.purchase_date 일자, ticket_class_info.ticket_class_name 티켓종류, SUM(ticket_class_info.ticket_price) 티켓_매출 FROM CUSTOMER_INFO JOIN TICKET_PUCHASE ON (customer_info.customer_id = ticket_puchase.customer_id) JOIN ticket_class_info ON (ticket_puchase.ticket_class_code = ticket_class_info.ticket_class_code) GROUP BY PURCHASE_DATE, ticket_class_info.ticket_class_name

SELECT ticket_puchase.purchase_date 일자, ticket_class_info.ticket_class_name 티켓종류, SUM(ticket_class_info.ticket_price) 티켓_매출 FROM CUSTOMER_INFO JOIN TICKET_PUCHASE ON (customer_info.customer_id = ticket_puchase.customer_id) JOIN ticket_class_info ON (ticket_puchase.ticket_class_code = ticket_class_info.ticket_class_code) WHERE PURCHASE_DATE = #{PURCHASE_DATE} GROUP BY PURCHASE_DATE, ticket_class_info.ticket_class_name
